definition: to breathe in/to suck in/to inhale
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Blend oils and then add to a bowl of steaming water and inhale for five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 混合油，然后添加到一碗热气腾腾的水和吸入五分钟。

sentences.english: Absorption is also dependent upon air flow rates and the partial pressure of the gases in the inspired air.
sentences.chinese: 吸收也取决于空气流速和吸入空气中的气体分压。

sentences.english: Use of inhaled corticosteroids does not clearly reduce these risks.
sentences.chinese: 使用吸入激素不能确切的降低这一危险性。

sentences.english: You may also inhale oils directly from the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以直接从精油瓶中吸入精油。

sentences.english: You don't want to inhale it, it's definitely not recommended.
sentences.chinese: 你不会想要把它吸入体内的，这是绝对不推荐的。

sentences.english: Inhalable particulate matters(IP)bring adverse influence on ambient air and human health.
sentences.chinese: 可吸入颗粒物严重影响空气质量和人体健康。

sentences.english: Xenon lung scans may be helpful in the early diagnosis of inhalation injury.
sentences.chinese: 氚肺扫描可能有助于早期诊断吸入性损伤。

sentences.english: Now you're the inventor of the Suck Kut right?
sentences.chinese: 那，你是吸入式理发器的发明人，对吧？

sentences.english: There were 18 inhalational allergens in allergen steep.
sentences.chinese: 变应原浸液内含18种常见吸入性过敏原。

sentences.english: Are air conditioning intakes which may permit the entry of cargo vapours closed?
sentences.chinese: 有可能吸入货物蒸汽的空调系统进气口是否已关闭？

sentences.english: Drape towel over head to allow steam to be inhaled.
sentences.chinese: 披覆在头上的毛巾，让蒸气被吸入。

sentences.english: If you use air-fresheners, you're inhaling pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 如果您使用的空气清新，您就会吸入污染物。

sentences.english: A friend of ours went to the Huashi Pharmacy, at the Portman, to purchase the inhaler she uses due to asthma.
sentences.chinese: 我们的一个朋友去华氏药店买哮喘的吸入器。

sentences.english: With each in breath, you are breathing in love and renewal.
sentences.chinese: 在每次吸气中，你都正吸入爱和恢复之力。

sentences.english: This will suck air in as water drains during use.
sentences.chinese: 它的作用是在热水器使用中水流出的时候吸入空气。

sentences.english: Letting go my strength and weakness, Breathing in Thy life divine.
sentences.chinese: 放弃软弱或是力劲，吸入怜悯和恩湛。

definition: poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
spout/spray/belch/to well up/to puff out/to spurt out
